### **Save the date - registration opening soon!**

Join us on Friday 4th September in York for this free full-day conference bringing together researchers, data scientists, and educators to explore the transformative role of AI in bioscience research and training.

## Target audience

Ideal for any health or bioscientist researchers looking to build AI confidence and skills in their projects.

## Registration

Registration will open in April. 

There are 100 places available for this in-person conference, please register using the [online form](YOUR_LINK_HERE). 

## Programme 

The programme will be announced shortly. 

## Venue 

The conference will be held at the Guildhall York, it is a fantastic venue located a short 10 minute walk from York Rail Station. 

Address: The Guildhall York, Coney Street, York, YO1 9QN
